name: High Cats
description: High Cats is a local multiplayer PC game where the objective is to catch the antagonist, a tuna can. The game supports 1 - 4 players and has full controller support, making it a fun couch party experience for you and your friends.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: 1.2GHz processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX Compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.4GHz processor or faster Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX Compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space
